sentences.en: A lantern depended from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 一盏灯悬挂在天花板上.

sentences.en: A little lantern blinked in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 一盏小灯笼在黑暗中微微闪光.

sentences.en: A little lantern blinked through the darkness.
sentences.cn: 一盏小灯在黑暗中闪烁着微光.

sentences.en: Colour the tiger lantern brown .
sentences.cn: 把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。

sentences.en: Harbin has a name for ice lantern.
sentences.cn: 哈尔滨以冰灯著称.

sentences.en: He extended his arm and adjusted the lantern again.
sentences.cn: 他一伸手,忙着去把灯扭亮了.

sentences.en: He hid the lantern in Huck's sugar hogshead and the watch began.
sentences.cn: 他把灯笼藏在哈克的糖桶里,开始望风.

sentences.en: In the course of time , this kind of lantern has become an exclusive of the Shens.
sentences.cn: 后来, 这种灯笼成了沈家的绝活.

sentences.en: In the course of time, this kind of lantern has become an exclusive of the Shens.
sentences.cn: 后来， 这种灯笼成了沈家的绝活。

sentences.en: It is a far cry from a magic lantern to television.
sentences.cn: 电视与幻灯大不相同.

sentences.en: Lantern owners write riddles on a piece of paper and post them on the lanterns.
sentences.cn: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.en: Light the lantern, take it and go down stairs.
sentences.cn: 你把这灯笼点起来，带着它下楼去。

sentences.en: Many boys explode firecrackers on the Lantern Festival.
sentences.cn: 许多男孩在元霄灯节燃放鞭炮.

sentences.en: The lantern hanging at her waggon had gone out.
sentences.cn: 她车上挂的那个灯笼已经灭了.

sentences.en: The lawn was again searched with a lantern.
sentences.cn: 她们又打着灯笼,把草坪搜了一遍.

sentences.en: The night lantern glowed softly in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 晚上点亮的灯笼在黑暗中发出柔和的光。

sentences.en: The off - duty watch relaxed under a lantern after the squall.
sentences.cn: 狂风过后,下了班的值夜人员在一盏提灯下憩息.

sentences.en: The old man used a kerosene lantern.
sentences.cn: 老人过去用一盏煤油提灯.

sentences.en: There is an ice lantern show in Harbin every year in winter.
sentences.cn: 每年冬天,哈尔滨有一次冰灯展.

sentences.en: To cheer themselves as well as they could, they made an artificial morning with the lantern, some bread and butter, and their own conversation, the real morning being far from come.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

sentences.en: What starts as an everyday squash turns into a lantern of light.
sentences.cn: 一个平平常常的南瓜变成了一个充满光亮的灯笼。

trans.tran_en: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light
